mapper.select: INSERT INTO IN_DATA(IN_CODE, IN_QUANTITY, IN_DATE, IN_DESCRIPTION, WA_CODE, PR_CODE) VALUES(('IN' || LPAD(TO_CHAR(IN_SEQ.NEXTVAL), 6, '0')), #{in_quantity}, TO_DATE(#{in_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #{in_description}, #{wa_code}, #{pr_code})

SELECT DISTINCT W.WA_CODE AS WA_CODE, W.WA_NAME AS WA_NAME FROM WAREHOUSES W INNER JOIN ( SELECT I.WA_CODE, NVL(SUM(I.IN_QUANTITY), 0) - NVL(SUM(O.OUT_QUANTITY), 0) AS STOCK FROM IN_DATA I LEFT JOIN OUT_DATA O ON I.WA_CODE = O.WA_CODE AND I.PR_CODE = O.PR_CODE WHERE I.PR_CODE = #{param1} AND I.IN_DATE <= SYSDATE AND (O.OUT_DATE <= SYSDATE OR O.OUT_DATE IS NULL) GROUP BY I.WA_CODE ) STOCK_SUMMARY ON W.WA_CODE = STOCK_SUMMARY.WA_CODE WHERE STOCK_SUMMARY.STOCK > 0 AND W.AC_CODE = #{param2}

SELECT DISTINCT STOCK_SUMMARY.STOCK AS PR_COUNT FROM WAREHOUSES W INNER JOIN ( SELECT I.WA_CODE, NVL(SUM(I.IN_QUANTITY), 0) - NVL(SUM(O.OUT_QUANTITY), 0) AS STOCK FROM IN_DATA I LEFT JOIN OUT_DATA O ON I.WA_CODE = O.WA_CODE AND I.PR_CODE = O.PR_CODE WHERE I.PR_CODE = #{param1} AND I.IN_DATE <= SYSDATE AND (O.OUT_DATE <= SYSDATE OR O.OUT_DATE IS NULL) GROUP BY I.WA_CODE ) STOCK_SUMMARY ON W.WA_CODE = STOCK_SUMMARY.WA_CODE WHERE STOCK_SUMMARY.STOCK > 0 AND W.AC_CODE = #{param2} AND W.WA_CODE = #{param3}
